src:
Jelang Pembukaan Kongres PSSI, Iwan Bule dan Vijaya Fitriyasa Bersitegang
02 Nov 2019, 10:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Belum juga dibuka, kongres PSSI sudah memanas beberapa menit sebelum resmi dimulai. Situasi memanas ini terjadi setelah Mochamad Iriawan mendorong Vijaya Fitriyasa karena mengintervensinya saat diwawancarai media di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019) pagi ini.
Kejadian bermula ketika Iwan Bule, Mochamad Iriawan, diwawancarai oleh kalangan media sebelum kongres dimulai. Tiba-tiba, Vijaya Fitriyasa menghampiri Iwan Bule. Vijaya berniat mengklarifikasi pernyataannya kepada Iwan Bule, yang berbuntut pelaporan ke Kepolisian.
Namun, Iwan Bule menolak. Lantaran Vijaya memaksa, Iwan Bule terpaksa mendorong Vijaya keluar dari kerumunan.
"Mumpung ada wartawan, saya ingin klarifikasi," kata Vijaya kepada Iwan Bule.
"Saya bicara dulu dengan wartawan," jawab Iwan Bule.
Vijaya Fitriyasa kukuh ingin meluruskan polemik antara dirinya dengan Iwan Bule di depan wartawan.
"Saya ingin klarifikasi saja," ujar Iwan.
Namun, Iwan Bule bergeming.
text:
Ahead of the Opening of the PSSI Congress, Iwan Bule and Vijaya Fitriyasa had an argument
02 Nov 2019, 10:47 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Not yet opened, PSSI congress heats up a few minutes before it officially starts. This heated up situation occurred after Mochamad Iriawan encouraged Vijaya Fitriyasa because of his interference when being interviewed by the media at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019) this morning.
The incident began when Iwan Bule, Mochamad Iriawan, was interviewed by the media before the congress began. Suddenly, Vijaya Fitriyasa approached Iwan Bule. Vijaya intends to clarify his statement to Iwan Bule, who is in the aftermath of reporting to the Police.
However, Iwan Bule refused. Because Vijaya insisted, Iwan Bule was forced to push Vijaya out of the crowd.
"While there are journalists, I want clarification," Vijaya said to Iwan Bule.
"I'll talk to reporters first," answered Iwan Bule.
Vijaya Fitriyasa firmly wants to straighten out the polemic between him and Iwan Bule in front of reporters.
"I just want to clarify," said Iwan.
However, Iwan Bule did not budge.
